requested: I'm not following this account yet, however I saved your request of account. We will determine later if we should follow.
video_to_long: This video is longer than 60s therefore we're unable to send it via dms.
links_not_supported: Links are currently not supported. If its a video resend it using the arrow button.
blocked: The post you were sending is either a post from someone who blocked us or an IGTV post. IGTV is not supported.
deleted: That account/post is currently shadowbanned. Try again later.
promote: This bot is being run by @floofygroup, follow them for updates!
dm: If you have any enquiry or feedback, please dm @floofygroup as dms will not be read on this account
in_queue: Placed your request in queue, current queue count: {}
long_queue: There are {} people in the queue. Let an admin upgrade your priority
admin.no_data: No {} information found, spread the news about your new-born bot!
